meanings.definition: The roots of a plant that are red in color.
meanings.sent1: The farmer dug up the redroots to inspect their color.
meanings.sent2: The redroots of the tree were vibrant and eye-catching.
meanings.sent3: The redroots peeked out from the soil like little red fingers waving.
meanings.sent4: The redroots intertwined underground, forming a crimson network of life.
meanings.sent5: The redroots pulsed with energy, sustaining the plant above.
